Class: Axis

insight. Axis

new insight.Axis(name, scale)

The Axis class coordinates the domain of the series data and draws axes.
Name Type Description
name string A uniquely identifying name for this chart
scale insight.Scales.Scale insight.Scale.Linear for example

Methods

#applyTheme(theme){this}

Applies all properties from a theme to the axis.
Name Type Description
theme insight.Theme The theme to apply to the axis.

#self.axisLabelColor(){function}

The color to use for the axis label.
Returns:
A function that returns the color of an axis label.

#self.axisLabelColor(color){this}

Sets the color to use for the axis label.
Name Type Description
color function | Color Either a function that returns a color, or a color.

#self.axisLabelFont(){String}

The font to use for the axis label.
Returns:
The font to use for the axis label.

#self.axisLabelFont(font){this}

Sets the font to use for the axis label.
Name Type Description
font String The font to use for the axis label.

#self.hasReversedPosition(){boolean}

Whether the axis is drawn in a reversed position.
Returns:
Whether the axis is drawn at the bottom/left (false) or top/right (true).

#self.hasReversedPosition(isReversed){this}

Sets whether the axis is drawn in a reversed position.
Name Type Description
isReversed boolean Whether the axis is drawn at the bottom/left (false) or top/right (true).

#self.isHorizontal(){boolean}

Whether or not the axis is displayed horizontally (true) or vertically (false).
Returns:
Whether the axis is horizontal.

#self.isOrdered(){Boolean}

Whether the axis values are displayed in order or not.
Returns:
Whether the axis is currently ordered.

#self.isOrdered(shouldOrderAxis){this}

Sets whether the axis values are displayed in order or not.
Name Type Description
shouldOrderAxis function | Boolean Either a function that returns a boolean, or a boolean.

The axis label

Whether the axis is drawn on the chart.
Returns:
Whether the axis is currently being drawn on the chart.

#self.shouldDisplay(displayed){this}

Sets whether the axis is drawn on the chart.
Name Type Description
displayed boolean Whether or not the axis will be drawn.

#self.shouldShowGridlines(){boolean}

Whether the axis has gridlines drawn from its major ticks.
Returns:
Whether the axis has gridlines drawn from its major ticks.

#self.shouldShowGridlines(showGridlines){this}

Sets whether the axis has gridlines drawn from its major ticks.
Name Type Description
showGridlines boolean Whether the axis has gridlines drawn from its major ticks.

#self.textAnchor(){string}

Gets the text-anchor attribute that will be set on each tick Label. One of: start/middle/end.
Returns:
The the current text-anchor attribute value.

#self.textAnchor(value){this}

Sets the text-anchor attribute that will be set on each tick Label.
Name Type Description
value string The text-anchor attribute that will be set on each tick Label.

#self.tickLabelFormat(){function}

Gets the function that will be used to format the axis tick labels.

A function that accepts the axis tick string and returns the formatted label

Sets the function that will be used to format the axis tick labels See `insight.Formatters` for pre-built examples.
Name Type Description
value function A function that accepts the axis tick label and returns the formatted label

#self.tickLabelOrientation(){string}

Gets the orientation of the tick labels: 'tb' = top to bottom, 'lr' = left to right.
Returns:
'tb' = top to bottom, 'lr' = left to right.

#self.tickLabelOrientation(value){this}

Sets the orientation of the tick labels: 'tb' = top to bottom, 'lr' = left to right. This is a helper function that sets the ticklabelRotation to either 0 or 90.
Name Type Description
value string 'tb' = top to bottom, 'lr' = left to right.

#self.tickLabelRotation(){number}

Gets the clockwise angle (degrees), that the each tick label will be rotated from horizontal.
Returns:
The clockwise angle (degrees), that the each tick label will be rotated from horizontal.

#self.tickLabelRotation(value){this}

Sets the clockwise angle (degrees), that the each tick label will be rotated from horizontal.
Name Type Description
value number The clockwise angle (degrees), that the each tick label will be rotated from horizontal.

The padding between the end of a tick and its label, in pixels.

#self.tickPadding(value){this}

Sets the padding between the end of a tick and its label, in pixels.
Name Type Description
value number The padding between the end of a tick and its label, in pixels.
